Articles.Content:
Hi guys! Me Again.

This time, i bring to you the U3 DragonFly. With a large delta wingspan, and two powerful turbojets to power it along, the U3 is at the cutting edge of kerbal technology! It even boasts a twin-cockpit configuration which allows one brave and possibly idiotic kerbal to pilot it, and one to operate the camera systems. If you have not figured it out already, this plane is based of the U2-"Dragon Lady" which is also a photographic reconnaissance aircraft. Anyway enough beating around the bush, time to watch that video!

See you later guys!

SamGaming
